title: Ag-NiP Deposited Green Carbon Channels Embedded NiP Panels for Sustainable Water Splitting

Ag-NiP-deposited carbon channels on NiP panels were successfully developed through lemon juice extract (Ag-CL/NiP) and citric acid (Ag-CC/NiP)-assisted methodologies. The methods involved the precise execution of electroless deposition of the...
